text: The Duke Blue Devils women's lacrosse team is an NCAA Division I college lacrosse team representing Duke University as part of the Atlantic Coast Conference. They play their home games at Koskinen Stadium in Durham, North Carolina. ==Historical statistics== {| width=60% class="toccolours" !colspan=2 style="; text-align:center" | Overall |- |Years of Lacrosse|| 23 |-bgcolor=#eeeeee |1st Season|| 1996 |- |Head Coaches || 1 |-bgcolor=#eeeeee |All-Time Record || 284-150 |- !colspan=2 style="; text-align:center" | ACC games |- |ACC season W-L record (Since 1997)|| 54-49 |-bgcolor=#eeeeee |ACC Titles|| 4 |- |ACC Tournament Titles|| 1 |- |-bgcolor=#eeeeee |- !colspan=2 style="; text-align:center" | NCAA Tournament |- |NCAA Appearances|| 19 |-bgcolor=#eeeeee |NCAA W-L record|| 24-19 |- |Final Fours|| 7 |-bgcolor=#eeeeee |Championship Games|| 0 |- |NCAA National Championships|| 0 |}*Statistics through 2018 season ==Individual career records== Reference: {| class="wikitable" |- !
